text: Slim Shady EP is the first extended play by American rapper Eminem, released on December 10, 1997 through the Detroit-based record label Web Entertainment. It helped to get Eminem signed to Interscope Records and Aftermath Records. ==Track listing== == Release and reception== According to an interview with Zane Lowe, Eminem made 500 copies of the EP, but sold only more than 250. == References == Category:1997 albums Category:Eminem albums Category:Hip hop albums
title: Slim Shady EP
